name: @wix-pilot/core
description: A flexible plugin that drives your tests with human-written commands, enhanced by the power of large language models (LLMs)
author: Asaf Korem <asaf.korem@gmail.com>

scripts.bump-version: npm version patch && git commit -am 'chore: bump version' && git push
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run bump-version && npm run build && npm publish --access public
